content: @Lloyd McKenzie can we say anything in the ballot introduction to reduce the problem of balloting on the wrong spec? Can we say that balloters should include a note in their ballot if they are happy for us to reassign ballot items if they pick the wrong spec? is there anything we can do?

I don't think reassigning is going to fly, whether voters are happy with it or not. We can call attention to the importance of submitting against the correct spec, but I don't know that's going to reduce the problem much.
can we preload the right ballot in the link to Gforge?
gForge doesn't allow you to specify parameters on the "create" URL.
roll on Jira. And please don't tell me if it's not going to be possible in Jira

It should be possible in Jira. With Jira we should be able to have a link beside the section voters can just click to submit items (or to view a filtered list of what change requests have already been submitted against the artifact). Possible we could have that in place before publishing in Dec.
ok committed updates for you to look at @Lloyd McKenzie
Committed minor edits. I did not review the list of changes
ok. there's 24 hours left for QA review, if anyone wants to do any
